    • Method Detail

      • findContact

        public static java.lang.String findContact​(int contactID)
        appointment construct needs to have a Contact_Name(however DB does not have this available in Appointment table. This will use the ContactID(provided in Appointment table to search for matching contactID(in the list off all contacts and will return the name of the contact associated with it
        Parameters:
        contactID -
        Returns:
        null if not found

      • findContact

        public static int findContact​(java.lang.String contactName)
        Used to get ContactID from a contact when name match is found
        Parameters:
        contactName -
        Returns:
        -1 if contact not found

        Takes a contact object and returns it's ID

        Returns:

      • setAllContact

        public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Contact> setAllContact()
        DB query to get all contacts
        Returns:
        null if SQL exception is thrown
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • getAllContact

        public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Contact> getAllContact()

        Returns:
        allContact
